title: Khloe Kardashian wages war against mum Kris Jenner over Lamar Odom memoir
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Khloe Kardashian wages a war against her mum Kris Jenner over her ex Lamar Odom in the next episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

In a trailer for the upcoming installment, the 35-year-old reality star learns that Lamar has written his autobiography Darkness To Light, which was released earlier this year, and is left raging when she finds out that Kris has lied to her about something.

‘Lamar is writing a book,’ Khloe tells the cameras before turning to her sister Kylie Jenner and saying: ‘In the book I found out…’

Advertisement

What painstaking discovery Khloe has stumbled across so far remains under lock and key, but Khloe is heard saying: ‘Mum is lying to me.’

As the clip continues, Kris is seen defending her actions and explains herself, saying: ‘I’m trying to do damage control.’

However, it looks like Kris’s efforts have little impact as Scott Disick is then roped in to try and help smooth Khloe’s relationship with her mum over.

Khloe Kardashian learns her mum is ‘lying to her’ in the next episode of Keeping Up (Picture: E!)

Kris Jenner admits to doing ‘damage control’ (Picture: E!)

‘She literally thinks you’re going to come for her,’ Scott tells Khloe as he attempted to calm her down.

But it looks like Kris should be worried, as Khloe confirms: ‘What? I am [coming for her.]’

Oooooooh boy we can’t wait for this drama to unfold.

Khloe and Lamar married in 2009 just one month after meeting but called it quits with Khloe filing for divorce in 2013.

The businesswoman withdrew the documents when Lamar was found unconscious in a brothel so she could help make medical decisions but later continued the separation with it becoming official in December 2016.

Khloe and Lamar were previously married (Picture: Getty)

Fans who’ve been keeping up with Khloe know that there’s no bad blood between her and her ex-husband over his book though.

Khloe congratulated Lamar on his autobiography success back in June when it was revealed to be on the New York Times bestsellers list, writing: ‘Look at God!!! Congratulations Lammy! Keep shining’.

Keeping Up With The Kardashians continues Sunday on E! in the US.
